title: Customer Inquires About Checking Fluid Levels
description: A customer wants to know how to check their vehicle's basic fluid levels, like engine oil and washer fluid.

tasks.description: Identify the customer's vehicle model and year.
Access the digital owner's manual to find the diagrams showing the location of the engine oil dipstick and washer fluid reservoir.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the relevant diagrams.

tasks.description: Verbally guide the customer on how to safely check the oil level (engine off, on level ground) and how to top up the washer fluid.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, safe, and accurate instructions.
